name: Space Oddity (Pablo Verdugo)
description:
Welcome to Space Oddity.

In this game you'r not a Super Hero or a Mastermind. You're a simple mouse who is trapped inside a Space Ship.

Your objective is to destroy the Main Computers to delay the rocket takeoff.

How To play. 

Use the Arrow Keys to move and jump.

You have tools! This tools have a number:

1.- Bucket: Use it as a platform.

2.- Table: A JumpThru platform.

3.- Radio: Interfiere the comunications and delay the take off 10 seconds.

4.- Eat: Eat a good Apple to adquire Doble Jump for 5 seconds.

5.- Energy Drink: Jump higher!

6.- Tool Box: Don't have time? Throw a box full of tools in a straight line to hit the Main Computer.

You can hit the Main Computers with the "Tool Box" or with your Body, hit the main computers 2 times to pass the level.

Remember that you only have 10 seconds! And you can not use more than 6 tools for Run! So think fast, think smart!

Music:

Cool Vibes - Film Noire by Kevin MacLeod 

Sax Attack by Stuart Bogie

Edit: There is a problem in the loading screen at the start. Just wait and smash that Space Bar.

Thanks for Playing!
